programme.title: Olympic Games Paris 2024: Closing Ceremony
programme.desc: (Live) The 2024 Summer Olympics, officially the Games of the XXXIII Olympiad and commonly known as Paris 2024, is an upcoming international multi-sport event that is scheduled to take place from 26 July to 11 August 2024.

programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid S6
programme.desc: Two teams of two compete in a word-association game. Each contestant gets a celebrity partner, and one partner provides clues to the other about six mystery words, leaving the other to guess those words before the time runs out. The team with the most points gets to play in the winners circle, where the top prize is $100,000. Michael Strahan hosts.

programme.title: Pokemon Master Journeys: The Series S24
programme.desc: It's a big, big world, but you know where to find Ash and Goh---battling and catching Pokemon from Kanto to Galar! With Pikachu, Cinderace, and their other Pokemon beside them, our heroes continue to travel all over the world to research Pokemon for Cerise Laboratory.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst Evolution

programme.title: The Adventure Of Little Penguin S1
programme.desc: Follow the hectic and exciting adventures of Oscar the little penguin in unique environments! The young penguin is setting out to explore the world, meeting new characters who teach him about himself, but also about others. He quickly discovers that it's not the destination that matters, but rather the people you meet along the journey.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Leo, Katie and Hero get to know a feathery new friend - an Indian peacock! They bring the peacock to the rainforest to look for peahens, but end up crossing paths with two jungle cats. The Junior Rangers bring a wild boar in their garden back to the forest. There, Ranger Rocky advises the Junior Rangers to find the boar's sounder, which is a group of female wild boars and their young children.

programme.title: Lil Wild S2
programme.desc: Pixel gloats over the captive white tiger in her secret HQ bunker and revels in her masterplan to control wild animals with her technology. Unbeknownst to Suzie, Pixel launches new experimental tech that enables her to control the minds of animals at the park. The experiment goes wrong, instead turning them into zombified versions of their former selves. As the only ones unaffected by the tech, it's all up to Rara and Jai to save their friends and their home.

programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Mandarin) Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. programme.title: Mechamato 'The Animated Series' S2
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Malay) Mechamato is a Malaysian animated series produced by Animonsta Studios, focusing on a boy named Amato and his partner robot MechaBot, who fight against bad robots. The animated series aired on Cartoon Network Asia from 4 December 2021 to 26 February 2022. Mechamato is a part of the BoBoiBoy franchise and the series also takes place before the original series and BoBoiBoy Galaxy.

programme.title: DENVER The Last Dinosaur
programme.desc: Where most kids dream of having a dog, a cat, or even a hamster, Cliff has a dinosaur - Denver! Within adventures revolving around Cliff, Denver and a comedic crew of human friends, there's an inevitable monkey wrench that is always in play - Denver is a dino in a china shop! Moreover, being one-of- a-kind puts Denver on everyone's radar.

programme.title: Sky Shakers Series
programme.desc: Z is furious over the latest report he has gotten from the Henchmen. He threatens them and informs them that he will be sending his latest Spy-Bots onto Earth. The children quarrels over whether they should approach SORA, their friendship breaks. SORA and Henchmen meets for negotiation. SORA agrees to give the Henchmen 48 Earth hours to settle their business without interaction with mankind. The Henchmen send out the Spy Bots to gather information on the Cratons.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - I'm Singaporean
programme.desc: Nathania Ong is only 26 and already onto her third role on London's West End. How did a Singaporean girl become the first to land these well-loved musical roles in Hamilton and Les Miserables?

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: In Part 2, Steven Chia investigates if women really are bad drivers and find out if Steven passed his driving test!

programme.title: Tanglin
programme.desc: Wafiq reaches out to Ali and persuades him to mend bridges with Zara. Ben's interest is piqued when Andre lets on a short term investment that promises high returns. Eddie has to hide his happiness about being in a relationship with Shruti so his family won't find out.

programme.title: India Unplated S1
programme.desc: Today we make our way to central India. Not very well known as compared to the other regions of India, cuisine from central India is distinct and unique and influenced by the hot weather and produce. In this episode, Adam shares his famous Bhopali Lamb Korma followed by Sandeep's Bhutte ki Kees, a delicious corn porridge that is full of nutrition and flavour. The final recipe is Indrahar by Helly, a popular snack made with five different types of lentils.

programme.title: Olympic Games Paris 2024: Summary of Paris 2024
programme.desc: Catch the round-up of the key moments at Paris 2024 and the highlights of Team Singapore athletes' performances as we say 'au revoir' to Paris.

programme.title: The Good Karma Hospital S4
programme.desc: 'The Good Karma Hospital' follows doctor Ruby Walker who swaps England for India and finds herself at an under-resourced and over-worked cottage hospital run by eccentric Englishwoman Lydia Fonseca (Amanda Redman).

programme.title: Spirit Of Sport S9
programme.desc: This month on Spirit of Sport, two sporting comeback stories for the ages with 2024 Laureus World Comeback of the Year Nominees Sbastien Haller and Katarina Johnson-Thompson. Borussia Dortmund and Ivory coast striker Haller reflects on his return to top-flight football for club and country after his battle with cancer and overcoming injury. Two-time heptathlon world champion Johnson-Thompson shares her road back to the top of the podium at the World Championships in Budapest.

programme.title: India Unplated S1
programme.desc: Andhra Pradesh is known for its spicy food all around the country. The inspiration behind such delicious variations of food lies in the opulent culture of the state, where exotic food is being prepared in the kitchen of the Nawabs since the year of its origin. The Andhra cuisine comprises of both mouth watering vegetarian and nonvegetarian dishes. The famous Hyderabadi dishes include appetising Biryanis, delectable rice and some tangy pickles and chutneys.

programme.title: Ainsley's Market Menu S1
programme.desc: The first stop on the Ainsley's Market Menu' is Willunga, a bustling farmers market in a charming, little town in South Australia. After setting up his stall Ainsley goes in search of the finest produce for his menu. Along the way he discovers some glorious pork loin from a rare breed pig farmer, for his spicy Chargrilled Jerk Pork'. For dessert, Ainsley selects some juicy strawberries and rich cream for a simple layered treat that honours seasonal ingredients.

programme.desc: 养生出大招，护心有绝招，医师见招拆招，草药包按摩胸口通心血管其实没有效，采用中医食疗才是最佳绝招，大蒜、生姜、黑木耳和丹参可以养护心血管，赶快跟随节目学习怎么食用才最好！ 别担心，练功有一招，资深气功师傅模仿稻草人站立，双臂伸展，加上一些小撇步就能打通气血流动，强化心肺功能！ 护心有妙招，节目组深入民间找到一位马来西亚第一代本土中医师，从这位96岁的老中医口中得知，原来肉桂才是护心大招！坚持每天服用上品肉桂，不止对心血管有保护作用，还有延年益寿的功效，这位老中医近乎百岁，却仍然头脑清晰，脸部还非常少皱纹呢.

programme.title: 云襄传
programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面) 寇元杰与南宫放的手下叶枭相见，原是寇元杰再次劫银，他交待叶枭去将官银处理成碎银，叶枭深知是寇元杰有意为难，却毫无办法。寇莲衣难忍弟弟如此胡来，出手教训寇元杰，但寇元杰并无丝毫收手之意，寇莲衣念及姐弟情意，将他们安置在城郊。再次交待他不准对云襄下手。柳公权带着明珠郡主找到南都知府，寻找水鬼劫银案的线索，另一边，云襄和莫爷爷开始草蛇灰线的琢磨银船去向。.

programme.title: 詹姆士出走料理 IV

programme.title: 很久很久以前
programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安) 二战过后，新加坡开始重整家园，建设学校和医院。到了适婚年龄的年轻男女，也开始共组家庭，有些妇女一生就是一打孩子。1966年，竹脚妇幼医院刷新记录，共迎接了3万9835个婴儿，成为全世界最大的妇产科医院。不过，国家穷，失业率高，僧多粥少，就连学校名额也不够。更糟糕的是，人口暴增，卫生条件差，疾病也开始肆虐。.

programme.desc: 银幕好友民雄与范逸臣，此趟将前往绝美的阿里山，走一趟林业铁道史、林班歌及邹族文化的旅行～此趟旅行在两人多年后再度合唱海角七号「国境之南」的歌声开始，他们将走进邹族圣山「塔山」的怀抱里，沉浸在群山苍翠与邹族文化的世界里，走过来吉吊桥听塔山的爱情凄美传说，搭上古道与森林铁道故事交织的阿里山高山火车，感受百年前修建铁道与伐木事业下人们生活的痕迹。你曾去访过全台最美的森林聚落「得恩亚纳」吗？您知道来吉部落间南非姑娘与邹族勇士经营的「Hana厨房」餐点吗？您知道来吉部落满街的山猪与猫头鹰的象征意义吗？如果您也期待有.

programme.title: 放下
